Custom Color for Remote Release Flac / Flechette Launcher.
Note: The red trigger signal cannot be modded at this time.
Brightness controls are not available as it causes a glitch between the Outer and Proximity elements; To reduce brightness, simply reduce your RGB values by the same percentage

Elements.Title: Target Proximity colour
Elements.Description:
Custom Color for Remote Release Flac / Flechette Launcher.
Note: The red trigger signal cannot be modded at this time.
Brightness controls are not available as it causes a glitch between the Outer and Proximity elements; To reduce brightness, simply reduce your RGB values by the same percentage

Elements.Description: (*Alpha) ** (if your custom colour is close to orange, add a little blue (eg. 0.1) to avoid a glitch on the targeting panel. The targeting panel uses a colour swap technique that looks for blue = 0).

Elements.Title: Mode
Elements.Description:
Speed/Distance/Alignment in Supercruise. Excluding lower panel lines and text colour.
If your chosen colour for Supercruise Speed/Distance elements are close to orange (high red, medium green), add 0.1 blue to avoid a glitch

Elements.Title: Combat HUD Mode
Elements.Description:
** Combat HUD (CHUD) MODE ** 
 For a standard CHUD, Set Colour 2 RGB(0,0,0) and Fade Strength = 0
 For a single colour Bird-of-Prey CHUD, Set Colour 2 RGB(0,0,0) and your preferred Fade Strength (0.7 is a nice balance)
 For a synthwave (dual-colour) CHUD, Set Colour 2 RGB to your preference, and Fade Strenth = 1

Elements.Title: Fade Strength
Elements.Description: Fade Strength (or Synthwave Colour Balance: > 1 = more Second Colour, < 1 = less Second Colour).

Alpha (mainly affects the opacity of the hull in bright light)
Set to approximately 1.0 to prevent fade in bright external light.
You can set this value higher than 1 to make the hologram very opaque

Elements.Title: Brightness
Elements.Description:
SRV Turret, Distributor Brightness Boost.
FDev applies an odd colour dampening filter to the SRV Turret screen.
Use this value to boost the colour of the distributor (it won't look exactly the same as the ship/SRV distributor due to the filter)
